caption: 🌟 Ready to elevate your daily routine? From morning coffee rituals to winding down after a long workday, it’s all about finding those little moments that spark joy. ☕✨ Join me in discovering tips to balance work and life—let’s thrive together! Share your favorite daily ritual in the comments below! 👇💬 #WorkLifeBalance #DailyJoy

avatar_data.prompt: A realistic portrait photo of a 25-35 year old person, friendly, professional, engaging personality, professional headshot quality, studio lighting, high resolution, photorealistic, detailed facial features, natural expression, suitable for social media profile, modern style

media_prompt: A lifestyle social media post image, featuring the same person from the avatar, related to: 🌟 Ready to elevate your daily routine? From morning coffee rituals to winding down after a long work, high quality, professional, Instagram-worthy, bright and engaging, modern aesthetic
